name: The Lost Clue Demo
description:
Story: One day a boy named Dopi discovered himself trapped into an unknown room after a sudden wake from sleep. Help Dopi in escaping this room. Find out the clues which lead towards solving the puzzles to escape.

Project Current State: This is a demo version of the idea which will be iterated and polished before final release.

For Release and other updates Keep Your Eyes at:
https://www.facebook.com/TheLostClue

Make Bug Report at: contact@kormikgames.com
